name: The Heliotrope Chronicles Book 1
description:
Join Frederick, Eforie, and their trusty compatriots as they begin their mystical, yet bone-chilling odyssey through the magical kingdoms across Europe and the Middle East. The group will experience first-hand how a society that still practices ancient Greek rituals vastly differs from cultural norms they grew up with, uncover the origins of the solomonaris that founded the kingdoms, and understand each other in ways that will change their friendships forever. Only by truly appreciating what magic has to offer the world can our young heroes rescue the magical sector from falling into the hands of the proud yet cunning Karnstein family, whose patriarch plots to open the gates of Hell to carry out this villainous deed. Having fallen into himself due to feeling like his actions are to blame for this predicament, Frederick will soon come to realize that he cannot clean up his messes by fleeing from them. Featuring the following royalty-free tracks;
